parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided text does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically exclude the post from being considered electoral propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an officially registered campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Larisa Blanari, identifying her as a PSD candidate for the Chamber of Deputies. This directly fulfills Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform.  The content is not a private message but aims to reach a broad audience within the specified targeting parameters. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post presents Larisa Blanari's views and statements, highlighting her candidacy and emphasizing her commitment to representing the people of Suceava.  The overall objective appears to be promoting her candidacy and influencing voters to support her. This strongly suggests an electoral objective, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c. The phrasing "Eu nu sunt de vânzare" ("I am not for sale") is a clear attempt to contrast her with other candidates and portray her as incorruptible, a common tactic in electoral campaigns.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic in nature. While it quotes Larisa Blanari, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected from journalistic reporting. The focus is on promoting the candidate, not providing balanced information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is presented as Larisa Blanari's personal opinion, but within the context of a paid political advertisement, it serves to promote her candidacy.  Therefore, it's not a purely personal opinion unrelated to the election.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>607073918491384</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by "Informatia ta," features Larisa Blanari, a PSD candidate.  The post's content directly promotes her candidacy, highlighting her views and emphasizing her commitment to her constituents.  The targeting parameters (age, location) further suggest an attempt to influence voters in Suceava County. While lacking a CMF number, the post's explicit mention of the candidate, its clear electoral objective, and its dissemination via a paid Facebook advertisement strongly indicate it constitutes electoral propaganda.  The post's message, particularly the phrase "Eu nu sunt de vânzare," is designed to sway voters' opinions.  The absence of journalistic objectivity further supports this conclusion.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Larisa Blanari</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Informatia ta, pentru incalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postari pe Facebook (ID 607073918491384) cu caracter de propaganda electorala, care promoveaza candidatura Larisei Blanari, candidat PSD la Camera Deputatilor,  prin prezentarea opiniilor sale si accentuarea angajamentului sau fata de alegatori.  Postarea, platita cu o suma sub 100 RON, a atins o audienta estimata intre 2000 si 3000 de impresii, cu o estimare a raspandirii intre 100.000 si 500.000 de persoane, in principal in judetul Suceava.  Textul postarii, in special fraza "Eu nu sunt de vânzare", are un efect electoral clar, vizand influentarea votului in favoarea candidatei.  Lipsa obiectivitatii jurnalistice si contextul publicitar platit demonstreaza intentia de a influenta procesul electoral.  Contactul advertiserului este anunturi@informatiata.ro si +40745691121.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
